member.name: T:CslaContrib.Windows.CslaComboBox
member.summary: Represents a Windows combo box control. It enhances the .NET standard combo box control with a ReadOnly mode and works fine with Csla NameValueList.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.Windows.CslaComboBox.Hide
member.summary: Conceals the control from the user.
member.remarks: Hiding the control is equvalent to setting the property to false. After the Hide method is called, the Visible property returns a value of false until the method is called.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.Windows.CslaComboBox.Show
member.summary: Displays the control to the user.
member.remarks: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the property to true. After the Show method is called, the Visible property returns a value of true until the method is called.

member.summary: Event that is raised when a data binding error occurs.

member.name: P:CslaContrib.Windows.CslaComboBox.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is read-only.
member.value: true if the combo box is read-only; otherwise, false. The default is false.
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, the contents of the control cannot be changed by the user at runtime. With this property set to true, you can still set the value in code. You can use this feature instead of disabling the control with the Enabled property to allow the contents to be copied. This property cannot be set at design time as it's intended to be handled only by ReadWriteAuthorization control.

member.name: P:CslaContrib.Windows.CslaComboBox.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating wether the control is displayed.
member.value: true if the control is displayed; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.Windows.StatusStripExtender
member.summary:
Add link to StatusStrip with Status and Animation.
1) Add a StatusStrip to the form and add 2 ToolStripStatusLabels. 2) Add the StatusStripExtender to the form. 3) Set statusStripExtender properties on StatusStrip StatusLabel to toolStripStatusLabel1 and AnimationLabel to toolStripStatusLabel2 4) Set status text with statusStripExtender1.SetStatus statusStripExtender1.SetStatusStatic statusStripExtender1.SetStatusWaiting statusStripExtender1.SetStatusWithDuration

member.summary: Set status message and stops the progress indicator from running

member.summary: Sets the Status and keep it until new text.
